reviews.text: About 5 years ago, these bungalows were wonderful, and cheap. Hot water shower, soap, towels, TV, Air con and brand new. I regularly used them.
reviews.title: Gotten worse

reviews.text: However, as the hotel became more popular, the bungalows seemed to always be booked out.
reviews.title: Budget Hotel in the city

reviews.text: The owners have appeared to have bought the nearby building, that has larger rooms, but not as clean and comfortable. (Presumably this was another hotel before) and so needs renovation.
reviews.title: Awful place to stay

reviews.text: Staff are friendly enough, but not too much English spoken.
reviews.title: Nice, clean, inexpensive place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: (Stayed October 2011- drop down menu doesn't go that far)
reviews.title: Nice personal but smelly bedroom
